post:
CaptureHost.com is now announcing our new VPS plans! We offer a wide variety of operating systems, running on both the OpenVZ and XEN kernels. We also offer Windows Server 2003/2008 on our XEN servers, for an extra license fee. All accounts also have a SolusVM login.

CaptureHost.com is a hosting company dedicated to providing you top of the line hosting services.
